author: djrtwo
content:
üö®  PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING BEFORE GETTING STARTED  üö® 
                      (failure to do so may result in a kick / ban)

üëã  Welcome to the Eth R&D server! We're excited to have you join us in exciting, technical conversations about all things core Ethereum. Your account does not become active until 10 minutes after joining, so please take a moment to read the following.

Getting Started Resources
+ Channel Guidebook: https://github.com/tvanepps/EthereumDiscordGuidebook
+  EthResearch: for deeper research posts & async dialogue http://ethresear.ch/

This server is dedicated to:
‚úÖ  Items actively affecting Ethereum mainnet ( <#745077610685661265> )
‚úÖ  R&D aimed toward enhancing Ethereum mainnet ( <#688075293562503241> )
‚úÖ  R&D pushing toward a major upgrade to Ethereum's core consensus ( <#598292067260825641> )

This server is not for:
‚ùå  Solidity education / feedback. check out the CryptoDevs discord: https://discord.gg/5W5tVb3
‚ùå  Basic support / technical questions. There are many resources to get you up to speed:  https://ethereum.org/en/learn/
‚ùå  Governance discussions. While the line can get blurry, try to err on the side of technical debate.
‚ùå  Promoting one's business, proprietary solution, or token: we have a zero tolerance policy on this.

If you are just getting started, please lurk and get a feel for how things work. Just watching conversations and following threads can be incredibly enlightening! Please be civil and respectful. If you'd feel uncomfortable saying something in person, that's a sign you shouldn't say it here.

Thank you for joining! Do your part to keep our corner of the internet awesome <:eth2:595693639913570305>
